history.narrative: Law 2-75 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-119, which was referred to the Committee on Education, Recreation and Youth Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 24, 1978 and February 7, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 24, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-153 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
